summary: Provides a full implementation of the Tabular Data Stream (TDS) protocol to communicate with Microsoft SQL Server. It handles connection establishment, authentication (including NTLM and Kerberos), packet negotiation, sending and receiving TDS messages, parsing column metadata and result rows, and offers utilities for executing SQL statements and retrieving results.
business_intent: Enable security professionals and developers to interact with SQL Server instances for testing, auditing, data extraction, or exploitation by programmatically managing TDS communication and authentication mechanisms.
